definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
extending all the way across/running all the way through

sentences.english: Once an idea has taken hold of the brain it's almost impossible to eradicate.
sentences.chinese: 一旦一種想法盤亙腦海，便難以消除。

sentences.english: Where the mind dwells, intrigues, rests;
sentences.chinese: 那裏總有想法盤亙，密謀，或靜止。

sentences.english: Spring fog drifts over a Pennsylvania apple orchard at sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 日出時分，仍未散去的春霧盤亙在賓州的蘋果園中。
